title: JSLib - 22 Modern JavaScript/TypeScript Libraries
description: Comprehensive usage documentation for all 22 production-ready npm packages

packages.name: @upendra.manike/tiny-utils
packages.description: Ultra-lightweight JavaScript utility functions - modern ES6+ alternatives to Lodash
packages.example:
import { flatten, merge } from '@upendra.manike/tiny-utils';
flatten([1, [2, 3]]); // [1, 2, 3]

packages.name: @upendra.manike/smart-date
packages.description: Human-friendly date formatting library - Convert timestamps to natural language
packages.example:
import { timeAgo } from '@upendra.manike/smart-date';
timeAgo(new Date(Date.now() - 3600000)); // '1 hour ago'

packages.name: @upendra.manike/react-motion-kit
packages.description: Prebuilt animation hooks for React - Built on Framer Motion
packages.example:
import { useHover } from '@upendra.manike/react-motion-kit';
const { ref, whileHover } = useHover({ scale: 1.1 });

packages.name: @upendra.manike/fetch-plus
packages.description: Next-gen Fetch Wrapper - Lightweight Axios replacement with retry, timeout, interceptors
packages.example:
import { FetchPlus } from '@upendra.manike/fetch-plus';
const api = new FetchPlus({ baseURL: 'https://api.example.com' });

packages.name: @upendra.manike/api-chain
packages.description: Declarative API chaining - Transform callback hell into beautiful workflows
packages.example:
import { createChain } from '@upendra.manike/api-chain';
await api.get('/users').then(res => res.data).execute();

packages.name: @upendra.manike/lite-fetcher
packages.description: Lightweight API client with built-in caching
packages.example:
import { createApiClient } from '@upendra.manike/lite-fetcher';
const api = createApiClient({ cache: { enabled: true } });

packages.name: @upendra.manike/cacheable-fetch
packages.description: Offline-first API Layer - Wrap fetch with automatic localStorage/IndexedDB caching
packages.example:
import { cacheableFetch } from '@upendra.manike/cacheable-fetch';
await cacheableFetch('/api/data', { cache: 'localStorage', ttl: 300000 });

packages.name: @upendra.manike/form-genie
packages.description: Schema to Form generator - Build React forms from JSON schema or Zod validation
packages.example:
import { FormGenie } from '@upendra.manike/form-genie';
<FormGenie schema={schema} onSubmit={handleSubmit} />

packages.name: @upendra.manike/motion-kit
packages.description: Framework-agnostic animation library - Works with React, Vue, Svelte, vanilla JS
packages.example:
import { fadeIn, slideIn } from '@upendra.manike/motion-kit';
fadeIn(element); slideIn(element, 'up');

packages.name: @upendra.manike/ai-mini
packages.description: Universal LLM Client - Unified API for OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, Groq
packages.example:
import { AIMini } from '@upendra.manike/ai-mini';
const ai = new AIMini({ provider: 'openai', apiKey: key });

packages.name: @upendra.manike/smart-storage
packages.description: Unified storage API - LocalStorage + SessionStorage + IndexedDB with TTL
packages.example:
import { createStorage } from '@upendra.manike/smart-storage';
await storage.set('key', data, 3600000); // 1 hour TTL

packages.name: @upendra.manike/commit-gen
packages.description: Natural Language to Conventional Commit - CLI tool for semantic commits
packages.example:
npx commit-gen 'fix login bug'
# Output: fix(auth): fix login bug

packages.name: @upendra.manike/env-checker
packages.description: Environment Variable Validator - Validate env vars at startup
packages.example:
import { checkEnv } from '@upendra.manike/env-checker';
checkEnv({ OPENAI_KEY: 'string', PORT: 'number' });

packages.name: @upendra.manike/react-skeletons
packages.description: Auto Placeholder Generator - Auto-generate skeleton loading states
packages.example:
import { Skeleton } from '@upendra.manike/react-skeletons';
<Skeleton width='200px' height='20px' />

packages.name: @upendra.manike/changelog-buddy
packages.description: Auto Changelog Generator - Reads commits and generates markdown changelog
packages.example:
npx changelog-buddy
# Generates CHANGELOG.md

packages.name: @upendra.manike/string-utils
packages.description: String manipulation utilities - camelCase, slugify, truncate, CSV conversion
packages.example:
import { camelCase, slugify } from '@upendra.manike/string-utils';
camelCase('hello world'); // 'helloWorld'

packages.name: @upendra.manike/array-helpers
packages.description: Array manipulation utilities - group by, aggregate, statistics, remove duplicates
packages.example:
import { groupBy, average } from '@upendra.manike/array-helpers';
groupBy(users, u => u.role); average([1,2,3,4]); // 2.5

packages.name: @upendra.manike/object-helpers
packages.description: Object manipulation utilities - deep clone, deep merge, pick/omit, flatten
packages.example:
import { deepClone, deepMerge } from '@upendra.manike/object-helpers';
const cloned = deepClone(original);

packages.name: @upendra.manike/validators
packages.description: Validation utilities - email, URL, phone, empty checks, type checks
packages.example:
import { isEmail, isUrl } from '@upendra.manike/validators';
isEmail('test@example.com'); // true

packages.name: @upendra.manike/dom-helpers
packages.description: DOM and browser utilities - clipboard, viewport detection, smooth scroll, debounce/throttle
packages.example:
import { copyToClipboard, debounce } from '@upendra.manike/dom-helpers';
await copyToClipboard('Hello');

packages.name: @upendra.manike/id-generator
packages.description: Secure ID generation - UUID, GUID, short unique strings, hash, mask
packages.example:
import { uuid, shortId } from '@upendra.manike/id-generator';
uuid(); shortId(8);

packages.name: @upendra.manike/dev-utils
packages.description: Developer utilities - logging, timing, query string parser, pub-sub event emitter
packages.example:
import { logger, measureTime } from '@upendra.manike/dev-utils';
const log = logger('MyApp');
